meanings.definition: A system of interconnected links or connections.
meanings.sent1: The linkwork of the chain held everything together.
meanings.sent2: The linkwork of the internet allows us to access information easily.
meanings.sent3: The linkwork of the necklace got tangled with the bracelet.
meanings.sent4: The linkwork of friendships forms a strong bond between people.
meanings.sent5: The intricate linkwork of the gears in the clock kept perfect time.

meanings.definition: The act or process of linking or connecting things together.
meanings.sent1: Her linkwork in organizing the event was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The linkwork between the two departments improved communication.
meanings.sent3: The linkwork of ideas in his speech was clear and logical.
meanings.sent4: The linkwork of teamwork is essential for success.
meanings.sent5: The seamless linkwork of the train schedule ensured timely arrivals.
